item.description: Extra...Extra...Extra...To ALL SINGLES...speedating is on at the Clarion Hotel of Northampton this coming Sunday. Personally I have never been to one of these events but it really sounds like fun. Can you imagine being able to figure out if someone is right for you in seven minutes...if not move on. Hey they should of thought of this a long time ago. Our group member Stefan recommended the activiy. Please go to the link provided for a detailed description on how briefdating works. The event only allows for fifty men and women and cost $30.00. Pre-registration is required and they recommend early arrival. Questions can be provided to Stefan at this link also. Don't lose out...you never know if you find the one...
item.name: Briefdating at the Clarion Hotel
